titles.title: Digital Commodity Intermediaries Act
Digital Commodity Intermediaries Act
An original bill to provide for a system of regulation of the offer and sale of digital commodities by the Commodity Futures Trading Commission, and for other purposes.

action.text: Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Boozman. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 312.
